verses.text: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.
verses.meaning: This verse summarizes the core of Christian belief, emphasizing God's love and the promise of eternal life through faith in Jesus Christ.

verses.text: In the same way, let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.
verses.meaning: Jesus encourages believers to live exemplary lives, showing God's goodness through their actions, which brings glory to God.

verses.text: Do to others as you would have them do to you.
verses.meaning: Known as the Golden Rule, this verse teaches treating others with kindness and fairness, reflecting Jesus' teachings on love and compassion.

verses.text: Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind and with all your strength. The second is this: Love your neighbor as yourself. There is no commandment greater than these.
verses.meaning: Jesus summarizes the commandments into these two greatest commands, emphasizing the centrality of love for God and love for others.

verses.text: Jesus answered, 'I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.'
verses.meaning: Jesus declares himself as the exclusive path to God, emphasizing faith in him as the only means of salvation and eternal life.
